Handles any regulatory compliance checks and reporting requirements.

The result of the compliance assessment
Handles the underwriting decision when needed.
A statement of income over a required duration in a suitable format
The provided debt statements may combine bank and non-bank managed debt details
The provided asset statement may combine bank and known non-bank managed assets
The outcome of the underwriting assessment
Handles the issuance and acceptance of required disclosures.
The type of disclosure (e.g. verbal, requiring signature)
The presented disclosure for customer review in any suitable format
An indicator that the disclosure has been accepted (indicates signature obtained as necessary)
The customer signature/acceptance record
Handling the evaluation and allocation of collateral.
The required collateral amount for the offer
Reference to earmarked collateral during the offer procedure
Reference to the related collateral asset (e.g. property)
Handles any internal audit compliance checks and reporting requirements.
The required compliance check
Description of the compliance requirements
The submitted offer related materials
Any required changes to the offer needed to comply
The result of the compliance assessment
Handles the booking of the asset or liability to the appropriate unit.
Defines the booking entity
Defines the booking rules (e.g. booking  value ratios)
The principle amount for booking
Handles the required credit checks and assessments.
The customer's current credit rating
Reference to the authorization if an aspect of the offer procedure
The credit decision (indicates credit position is adequate for the offer)
Handles the set-up of the master agreement and product specific terms and conditions

Reference to a specific product instance if the offer is accepted and the product set-up initiated
